channel.title: Minor Oversight - We've Got Hostiles
channel.description:
When I found the first group of soldiers, one of them said "I'm tired of these games Freeman!." And from my understanding, there are parameters set to prevent the soldiers from saying any Freeman lines until a bit later in the game.
Took a pic of the area where I heard it and the soldier who said it:
![](upload://4z5G2IZt5wOwviENunvdlKHFy6w.png)
![](upload://4z5G2IZt5wOwviENunvdlKHFy6w.png)

item.title: Minor Oversight - We've Got Hostiles
item.dc:creator: KyuuGryphon
item.description:
I’ve had this happen before too. I think it’s random, even though they shouldn’t really say it till later.

Read full topic
